messages.speech: Designing for emerging markets have a different set of challenges compared to developed markets. The concept of elite¬ù apps were introduced to address the issue of poor internet connectivity in emerging countries. In this session, you will learn:- how constraints and opportunities of emerging markets are shaping the design of technology as well as the products we use- how to design for the next billion users who embrace all cultures- how to design and adopt technology, made in the west, and fit it to emerging markets. How else can I help you?
